headline: Realty Income to Present at Nareit's REITweek: 2025 Investor Conference
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced that Sumit Roy, Realty Income's President and Chief Executive Officer, will participate in a moderated company presentation at Nareit's REITweek: 2025 Investor Conference on Tuesday, June 3, 2025, at 11:45 a.m. EDT/ 8:45 a.m. PDT.

headline: 2 Ultra-High-Yield Dividend Stocks Down About 30% to Buy Now and Hold Forever
summary: Shares of Realty Income and NNN REIT have fallen a long way from peaks they reached in 2020.  Realty Income is an international real estate investment trust with over 30 years of steady dividend raises.  NNN REIT is one of just a few REITs that has raised its dividend payment for at least 35 consecutive years.

headline: Nothing But Net (Lease REITs)
summary: Read here for top Net Lease REITs with attractive WACC and strong growth potential. Learn how quality metrics drive long-term returns for savvy investors.
